skills.desc: Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies except this Champion for 3 turns. Then, all allies except this Champion will attack 1 target enemy.

skills.desc: Deflects 20% of all incoming damage this Champion receives onto all allies. The damage will be spread equally across all allies.
